creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund; purchase from the collection of Elizabeth and Willard Clark
description: figure seated on small, flat rock formation upper center, wearing orange robes; blue hair, and large bump on head; several other, smaller figures in colorful robes seated on flat rock formations, most wearing colorful robes and holding objects like staffs, inscribed papers, and rosaries in hands; all figures have halos; trees, waterfalls, and swirling clouds separate figures
inscription: LRC:寫唐之禅月大師感得之図；六十三公?
signed: LRC:龍華園(?)佛乗慈僊謹拜画
title: Zengetsu Daishi and Saints
